TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RulePredicates extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ComplexProperty
Public NotInheritable Class RulePredicates Inherits ComplexProperty

summary.span: 表示适用于某个规则的一组条件和例外情况。

span.span: Represents the set of conditions and exceptions that are available for a rule.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Categories As StringList

summary.span: 获取对传入邮件标记为与中的条件或例外应用的顺序的类别。

span.span: Gets the categories that an incoming message is labeled with in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 与消息关联的类别。

span.span: The categories that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsBodyStrings As StringList

summary.span: 获取在正文中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入消息中显示的字符串。

span.span: Gets the strings that appear in the body of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 正文字符串与邮件相关联。

span.span: The body strings that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsHeaderStrings As StringList

summary.span: 获取应用的条件或例外顺序中的传入消息头中显示的字符串。

span.span: Gets the strings that appear in the headers of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 与邮件相关联的标题字符串。

span.span: The headers strings that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsRecipientStrings As StringList

summary.span: 获取出现在 ToRecipients 或 CcRecipients 属性中的条件或例外的顺序应用中的传入消息的字符串。

span.span: Gets the strings that appear in either the ToRecipients or CcRecipients properties of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 收件人字符串与邮件相关联。

span.span: The recipient strings that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsSenderStrings As StringList

summary.span: 获取 From 属性中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入消息中显示的字符串。

span.span: Gets the strings that appears in the From property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 发件人字符串与邮件相关联。

span.span: The sender strings that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsSubjectOrBodyStrings As StringList

summary.span: 获取显示在正文或中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入邮件的主题的字符串。

span.span: Gets the strings that appear in either the body or the subject of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 主题或正文字符串与邮件相关联。

span.span: The subject or body strings that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsSubjectStrings As StringList

summary.span: 获取在主题中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入消息中显示的字符串。

span.span: Gets the strings that appear in the subject of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 主题字符串与邮件相关联。

span.span: The subject strings that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property FlaggedForAction As Nullable(Of FlaggedForAction)

public: property Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FlaggedForAction> FlaggedForAction { Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FlaggedForAction> get(); void set(Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FlaggedForAction> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对传入邮件中的条件或例外应用的顺序显示的操作值的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets the flag for action value that appears on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: FlaggedForAction 属性值。

span.span: The FlaggedForAction property value.

span.para: 可以禁用此属性设置为 null。
can be disabled by setting this property to null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FromAddresses As EmailAddressCollection

summary.span: 获取的传入消息的发件人的电子邮件地址中的条件或例外应用的顺序。

span.span: Gets the e-mail addresses of the senders of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 电子邮件地址的集合。

span.span: A collection of e-mail addresses.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FromConnectedAccounts As StringList

summary.span: 获取电子邮件从其传入消息必须具有已聚合的条件或例外的顺序应用中的帐户名称。

span.span: Gets the e-mail account names from which incoming messages must have been aggregated in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 与邮件相关联的电子邮件帐户名称。

span.span: The e-mail account names that are associated with the message.

span.para: 可以禁用由该属性设置为一个空列表。
can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasAttachments { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否传入消息必须具有的条件或例外应用的顺序中的附件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must have attachments in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果的传入消息必须具有附件中的条件或例外的顺序应用;否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must have attachments in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Importance As Nullable(Of Importance)

public: property Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Importance> Importance { Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Importance> get(); void set(Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Importance> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对传入邮件中的条件或例外应用的顺序标的重要性。

span.span: Gets or sets the importance that is stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 重要性属性值。

span.span: The Importance property value.

span.para: 可以禁用此属性设置为 null。
can be disabled by setting this property to null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsApprovalRequest { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须审批请求中的条件或例外的顺序应用传入消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be approval requests in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果必须应用; 对于条件或例外顺序中的审批请求的传入消息。否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be approval requests in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAutomaticForward { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须按条件或例外的顺序应用自动转发传入消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be automatic forwards in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果必须按条件或例外的顺序应用; 自动转发的传入消息。否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be automatic forwards in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAutomaticReply { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须按条件或例外的顺序应用的自动答复传入消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be automatic replies in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果必须应用; 对于条件或例外顺序中的自动答复的传入消息。否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be automatic replies in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsEncrypted { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须 S/MIME 加密的条件或例外的顺序应用传入消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be S/MIME encrypted in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果必须 S/MIME 加密的条件或例外应用; 的传入消息。否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be S/MIME encrypted for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsMeetingRequest { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须传入消息会议请求中的条件或例外应用的顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be meeting requests in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 如果必须会议的传入消息，则 true 请求中的条件或例外的顺序应用;否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be meeting requests in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsMeetingResponse { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须会议传入消息的条件或例外的顺序应用中的响应。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be meeting responses in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果的传入消息必须满足的条件或例外的顺序应用; 响应否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be meeting responses in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsNonDeliveryReport { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否传入消息必须以未送达报告 (NDR) 中的条件或例外应用的顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be non-delivery reports (NDR) in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果的传入消息中的条件或例外的顺序应用; 必须未送达报告 (NDR)否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be non-delivery reports (NDR) in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPermissionControlled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示传入邮件是否必须进行的条件或例外应用的顺序中控制权限 (受 RMS 保护)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be permission controlled (RMS protected) in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果的传入消息中的条件或例外的顺序应用; 必须权限控制 (受 RMS 保护)否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be permission controlled (RMS protected) in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReadReceipt { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须读取传入消息中的条件或例外应用的顺序的回执。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be read receipts in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果的传入消息必须阅读顺序的条件或例外应用; 回执否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the incoming messages must be read receipts in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsVoicemail { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否传入消息必须应用的条件或例外顺序中的语音邮件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemClasses As StringList

summary.span: 获取必须在应用的条件或例外顺序中的传入邮件标记的项类。

span.span: Gets the item classes that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果必须对传入邮件中的条件或例外的顺序应用; 标记的项类否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the item classes must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

summary.span: 获取必须在应用的条件或例外顺序中的传入邮件标记邮件分类。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NotSentToMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入消息的 ToRecipients 属性中不能邮箱的所有者。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must not be in the ToRecipients property of the incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 如果邮箱所有者不得应用; 对于条件或例外顺序中的传入消息 To 收件人，则 true否则为为 false。

span.span: true if owner of the mailbox must not be a To recipient of the incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Sensitivity As Nullable(Of Sensitivity)

public: property Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Sensitivity> Sensitivity { Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Sensitivity> get(); void set(Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Sensitivity> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置必须标的敏感度对传入邮件中的条件或例外应用的顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the sensitivity that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: Sensitivity 属性值。

span.span: The Sensitivity property value.

span.para: 可以禁用此属性设置为 null。
can be disabled by setting this property to null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentCcMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否邮箱的所有者必须是中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入消息的 CcRecipients 属性中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be in the CcRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果邮箱的所有者必须是应用; 对于条件或例外顺序中的传入消息的抄送收件人否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the owner of the mailbox must be a Cc recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentOnlyToMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否必须应用的条件或例外顺序中的传入消息的 ToRecipients 属性中只能有一个邮箱的所有者。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be the only one in the ToRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果邮箱的所有者必须是唯一给收件人的条件或例外应用; 的顺序中的传入消息否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the owner of the mailbox must be the only To recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentToMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否邮箱的所有者必须是中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入消息的 ToRecipients 属性中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be in the ToRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果邮箱所有者必须为 To 收件人应用; 对于条件或例外顺序中的传入消息否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the owner of the mailbox must be a To recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentToOrCcMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否邮箱的所有者必须是中的条件或例外应用的顺序的传入消息的 ToRecipients 或 CcRecipients 属性中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be in either a ToRecipients or CcRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: true 如果邮箱所有者必须为 To 收件人或抄送收件人应用; 对于条件或例外顺序中的传入消息否则为为 false。

span.span: true if the owner of the mailbox must be either a To recipient or Cc recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WithinDateRange As RulePredicateDateRange

summary.span: 获取在其中传入消息必须已接收的条件或例外的顺序应用中的日期范围。

span.span: Gets the date range within which incoming messages must have been received in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 开始和结束的日期。

span.span: The start and end dates.

span.para: 可以通过设置来禁用和属性设置为 null。
can be disabled by setting the and properties to null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WithinSizeRange As RulePredicateSizeRange

summary.span: 获取传入消息必须具有中的条件或例外应用的顺序的最小和最大大小。

span.span: Gets the minimum and maximum sizes that incoming messages must have in order for the condition or exception to apply.

value.span: 最小大小和最大大小值。

span.span: The minimum size and maximum size values.

span.para: 可以通过设置来禁用和属性设置为 null。
can be disabled by setting the and properties to null.
